QuestData.Title: Mystery Goo
QuestData.Description: The greenish substance inside the cauldron is putrid and viscous. No matter what it is, it doesn't seem to be good.$B$BIt would be best to report back to Donova with your findings, along with a sample of the liquid in the cauldron.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report back to Donova Snowden with your findings.
QuestData.CompletionText: I hope you found something, $n. The Winterfall are becoming increasingly aggressive!
QuestData.RewardText: Disturbing news indeed. This stuff's much more like what you'd see in Felwood than in Winterspring...
